extension.name: FavEffects
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavEffects is a free responsive Joomla! module that uses any icon from Font Awesome and 8 preset icon hover CSS3 effects.
For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavEffects module.



Copyright © 2012-2017 FavThemes.

field.name: jquery_load
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: This setting loads Joomla!'s jQuery library. Choose NO if your website loads jQuery from an external source.

field.name: layout_effect
field.label: Layout Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the layout on page scroll and load. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: icon_width
field.label: Icon Width
field.description: Insert the width for the icon using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_border_radius
field.label: Icon Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the background of the icon using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_border_type
field.label: Icon Border Type
field.description: Choose the border type of the background of the icon.

field.name: icon_border_width
field.label: Icon Border Width
field.description: Insert the border width for the background of the icon using pixels (for example: 1px, not 1). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_google_font
field.label: Title Google Web Font
field.description: Insert the name of the Google Font for the title of the module, for example Open Sans or Roboto. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_font_weight
field.label: Title Font Weight
field.description: Set the font weight for the title of the module.

field.name: title_font_style
field.label: Title Font Style
field.description: Set the font style for the title of the module.

field.name: title_font_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the title of the module using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: show_icon1
field.label: Show Icon 1
field.description: Choose if the icon for this module should be displayed or not.

field.name: icon_effect1
field.label: Icon 1 Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the icon. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: icon_name1
field.label: Icon 1 Name
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name (for example: fa-magic or fa-joomla). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_color1
field.label: Icon 1 Color
field.description: Choose the color for the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_bg_color1
field.label: Icon 1 Background Color
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_link1
field.label: Icon 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the icon. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_link_target1
field.label: Icon 1 Target
field.description: Choose the link target of the URL for the icon.

field.name: icon_font_size1
field.label: Icon 1 Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the icon using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: icon_border_color1
field.label: Icon 1 Border Color
field.description: Choose the color for the border of the background of the icon. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text1
field.label: Title 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_color1
field.label: Title 1 Color
field.description: Choose the color for the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.
